# When to use Neural Nets

  - Computer vision
  - Audio data
  - "Generative Deep Learning"
  - "Reinforcement Learning"
  - "Graph Data"

  - Structured Data?
  - NLP?
  - Time series?


Use neural nets for unstructured data. This included any kind of photo/video data and any speech data.

Use non-neural networks for structured data machine learning problems like regression, classification, and clustering. 

Overlap of both: NLP and time series

# Success Metrics for Regression

    - Mean Squared Error (MSE)
    - R-Squared

Others:
    - Sum of Squared Error (SSE)
    - Sum of of Squared Regression Error (SSR)
    - Total Sum of Squared (SSTO)


# Success Metrics for Classification

    - Accuracy
    - Precision 
    - Recall 
    - F1 
    - AUC/ROC
